    Description
    Checklist_Activity
    This class is responsible for the activity of the Checklist and related diaglogs.
    Checklist_AddNewItem
    This file is responsible for the addition of new items to the checklist activity.
    Checklist_RecyclerItemTouchHelper
    Constructs a new Checklist_RecyclerItemTouchHelper with the specified adapter.
    Checklist_Setup_Activity
    This class is dedicated to displaying the recommended tips from the literature to the user so that they can add them to their own checklist.
    Checklist_SplashActivity
    Displays the splashscreen and logo on startup
    DialogCloseListener
    declares the methods implemented by DialogCloseListener
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    Info_Page_Activity
    Activity class for the Information Page
    Main_Activity
    Class that encompasses the functionality of the Home Page for the application and allows users to navigate to all other pages of the application
    Pin_Activity
    Class for that handles the activity of the Pin page Code created referencing Michey Faisal Integrate Android PassCode Security in your android app Android Studio latest
    Pin_Setup_Pin
    Class that handles the setting of the user's pin Code created referencing Michey Faisal Integrate Android PassCode Security in your android app Android Studio latest
    Pin_Setup_Settings
    Class that handles the re-setting of the user's pin Code created referencing Michey Faisal Integrate Android PassCode Security in your android app Android Studio latest
    Profile_Activity
    Profile_Activity displays and manages user profiles.
    Profile_AddProfile
    A BottomSheetDialogFragment used for adding a new profile.
    Profile_DeleteProfile
    Handles the deleting of a profile and the associated pop-up prompts
    Profile_EditProfile
    Profile_EditProfile class handles the functionality related to editing a user profile.
    Security_Questions_Ask
    This class represents the activity for asking security questions.
    Settings_Activity
    This class represents the settings activity where users can configure various app settings.
    Setup_Security_Questions_Pin
    This activity allows the user to set up security questions along with their answers for PIN recovery.
    Setup_Security_Questions_Settings
    Setup_Security_Questions_Settings class is responsible for managing the setup of security questions and answers.
    Sharing_Activity
    To share files using wifi direct, we first need to define our wifi direct methods, classes etc.
    Sharing_SendInfo
    Sharing_SendInfo class manages the UI for sending profile information to nearby devices via Wi-Fi Direct (P2P).
    Tips
    The Tips class represents tips for safe sleeping practices for babies.
    Topics
    The Topics class represents topics related to safe baby sleeping practices.
